notes:
The Global Mine Action Database (GMAD) provides country-level data on a core set of variables related to mine action for mine-affected countries and territories between 2010 and 2013.  

The database spans 2010-2013. Data is collected on all mine-affected countries and territories between 2010 and 2013 as identified by the Landmine Monitor. A country or territory is included in the database if it was either mine-affected or suspected to be mine affected at any point during the time frame of the database. This results in 61 unique countries and territories.
